title: Anna Karenina
author: Leo Tolstoy
quote: "All happy families resemble one another, each unhappy family is unhappy in its own way.‚Äù"
details: The story of Anna Karenina as she falls in love with Count Vronsky and cheats on her husband, Alexey Karenin. They keep the affair secret for some time, but after Anna has Vronsky's child, Anna leaves her husband, eloping with Vronsky and leaving behind her son, Seryozha.
